name: Kingdom Hearts 2 Final Mix+ Beginner Mode any%
description: A route for the JP version of kh2fm beginner I made 3 years ago. Want to get sub 5 with this before updating my route

steps.desc: Go forward and talk to people
Choose right weapon
Fight Seifer with jump combos
Run torwards nobody
Fight nobody
Go to save point
In alley go backwards to grab skateboard and go forwards
do delievery mail
Go into alley, skateboard, run forwards
Against nobody, jump attacks
grab sword
Jump attacks on nobody's

boss.title: Twilight Thorn
boss.desc: Do reaction thing, Jump combos, run backwards when he runs torwards, and jump combos, reversing when needed, should easily 1 cycle him

steps.desc: Pause 1
menu: go to options, turn off summon effects

steps.desc: fight hayner
steps.fight: one jump hit, then do ground combos, kind of running away until he's out of balls

steps.desc: Fight Vivi
steps.fight: just ground combos only, the three hit one

steps.desc: Fight Axel
Use single hits to let seifer kill you
Pause 2
try to do single hits against Vivi's
Ground hits against shadow dude
cut through the sandlot

boss.title: Axel
boss.desc: Do ground combos, don't do the clash reaction command

steps.desc: Change equips
Grab ether chest right inside of Wizards tower to the right
Valor form immediately
After going into Merlin's house, run left up to the to level by the bailey, grab two treasure chests (one on the left, one on the center)
Change equips
Walk back behind save point to grab ether chest, then drive and go forward into battle
steps.hint: Apart from the shadows, use jump combos on the heartless here

steps.desc: Do the 3 missions, drive ASAP
steps.hint: Drive gauge should be refilled torwards the end of the third mission

steps.desc: Valor form after fighting in cave with Mulan, on way out grab AP boost on left side of tunnel
On way up the mountain, grab AP boost behind fireworks
After mountain fight, pause II
Drive on way back down mountain, and redrive after sora only spot

boss.title: Shan-Yu
boss.desc: Do initial Jump hit, then ground combos until shadow mode, then guard when he comes at you.

steps.desc: Escape with Auron
battle: Steal Aurons Ethers (Scan)
On second platform, use Auron's limit
When Fat guy appears use Auron's limit

steps.desc: Pause III
On way to Ceberus, grab AP boost on stairs to the right in the tunnel, and the Ether a little ways above that

boss.title: Ceberus
boss.desc: Jump backwards a bit, do ice to get him to spit fire, die, utilize Mickey

steps.desc: Use Valor form to go back and forth in Olympus
After going back down, grab big green chest in Lobby of the Underworld.
Grab AP boost on platform before demyx
Grab AP boost to left of green portal
Pause IV
drive into valor during the second part of Pete fight
Pause V

boss.title: Hydra
boss.desc: Use trinity limit immediately, then jump on Hydra's back. Trinity limit again right away. Do jump attacks, when heads are down, use Ether and Trinity Limit again, more jump attacks.

steps.desc: Grab AP boost behind Pooh's house
Pause VI
In first room, use Trinity Limit, just square side and kill all the shadows
Use Valor and run around

boss.title: Door shadow
boss.desc: Go to Valor before battle, attack the door shadow exclusively, jump combos

steps.desc: Grab AP boost in save room, chest on right side
Drive and grab AP boost right after lantern minigame, and AP boost in next area behind statues
Jump combo on Beast
Change equips
menu: From Beast unequip Ferocious Rush and Howling Moon

steps.desc: Valor form to run to Ballroom

boss.title: Chandelier boss
boss.desc: Jump combos on first form of boss. Jump combos on invisible boss, ignore reaction command, when he is on last health bar, Trinity Limit

steps.desc: Valor form in Disney Castle
Go front right corner of Disney courtyard to grab AP boost
Go visit the Moogle
Drive on way to see Pete, Jump combo on Pete
Doors!
battle: Second door is first
Use Chicken Little in town room
In firefighter room, use Trinity Limit when two cars show up
Chicken Little in dark hole room

steps.desc: Pause VII
Last door, jump combos on the scaffolding guys, until time to use the reaction command thing
Valor form and run to Petes boat

boss.title: Boat Pete
boss.desc: After Pete is knocked out, run and grab AP boost at end of Ocean, then get on and hit Pete

boss.title: Pete
boss.desc: Just do ground combos until Pete retreats once. After scene switch use Trinity limit

steps.desc: Pause VIII

battle: Slide dash in and reflect on the invincible pirates
Second part of pirates, use ice on them until mp is out

steps.desc: After town battle, turn right to alleyway, when in between boxes, drive into Wisdom, turn right and grab AP boost
Use Ice on this zombie ambush
Use Chicken Little during the 1 minute pirate thing
During battle with Black Pearl, go up stairs and call up Chicken Little, jump combos on the pirates
When on Isla De Meurta, Valor form
On way to Barbossa, grab AP boost behind the exploding boxes, last exploding box has an AP boost too

boss.title: Barbossa
boss.desc: After Valor form, ice lock Barbossa, and use jump combos

steps.desc: Trinity Limit right away
When Alladin comes in, change equips
menu: Equip Aerial Spiral and Aerial Finish
Switch to Donald, and equip Donald Cure

steps.desc: Use Wisdom Form, on way out of city, destroy last booth in the path on the left for an AP boost
Grab AP boost form the second chest on the way down the cave
Grab AP boost from chest to the right before going to treasure room
In treasure room switch to Goofy during fist wave so during second you can Trinity Limit the three fat bodies
Valor form after treasure room, run torwards bosses

boss.title: 2 Elemental Lords
boss.desc: Focus on each boss as they are big, when one is destroyed, use Aladdins limit on the other

steps.desc: When entering, use Valor form
Switch to Oathkeeper beforehand
Switch back to Heroes Crest after
Change Equips
Summon Genie before leaving the lab
Don't kill the enemies in the forced battle, let them hit you
Grab AP boost behind tree on way to Christmas Town
During second? wave of required Christmas town party fight use Jacks limit
On way out of Christmas Town, buy Auamarine ring

boss.title: Graveyard Heartless
boss.desc: Use Jacks limit on graveyard boss, and then Valor form, reuse Jacks limit when he has 1 HP bar left

boss.title: Grab AP boost past save in Santas house
Oogie Boogie
boss.desc: Air combos, use Trinity Limit second time Oogie Boogie gets knocked down

steps.desc: Drive into Wisdom when entering the bailey
Grab AP boost in corner before entering building
Grab AP boost all the way to the right in the maze (keep taking rights till you get there)
Drive when you get near the cursed brick to destroy it
Grab stitch on way back to Tron
Go left at first intersection during Tron cycles
When you get Tron change equips
menu: Change Master form keyblade to Oathkeeper

steps.desc: Summon Chicken Little on way to dataspace green machine
Use Finishing Leap combo against those guys in the dataspace room
After Dataspace fight go to Tron, unequip Auto-limit
Grab AP boost in top left of room past bridge

boss.title: NOT_FOUND Heartless
boss.desc: Air combos on boss, use Trinity Limit. Go Master form when 2 HP bars are left

steps.desc: Chicken Little on required fight outside of room, Finishing Leap is boss
Chicken Little on next required fight
Before Demyx, pause IX

boss.title: Demyx
boss.desc: At end of water forms, use Trinity Limit, do a ground combos, summon stitch, guard/reflect his attacks

steps.desc: Grab AP boost in cave before 1000 Heartless battle
Pause X
menu: Equip Experience Boost and Drive Boost
Switch to Goofy equip Goofy Bash and Jackpot

steps.desc: 1000 Heartless battle
steps.fight: Use Reaction commands to kill 1000 Heartless, work on damaging yourself to critical mode

steps.desc: Change Equips
menu: Switch Beast out, so you can Trinity Limit during Ballroom fight

steps.desc: Wisdom Form on way to Beast
Pause XI
menu: Equip Hero's Crest to Master Form

steps.desc: Use Ice to nail the pirates

boss.title: Grim Reaper I
boss.desc: Use Finishing Learp until it's first bar is destroyed, then Master Form

steps.desc: Pause XII
Collect the cursed coins!
battle: Use Thunder and Trinity Limit on curse holding Heartless
Get the Curse holding Heartless under the shipwrecked area
On the quick Heartless, do a Finishing Leap combo, then air square combo
Get the Heartless in the exploding box areas

boss.title: Grim Reaper II
boss.desc: Do Blizzard into Finishing Leap into air combos. Master Form and Ethers do destroy get all the gold from the third form

steps.desc: Thunder into Trinity Limit on Lock/Shock/Barrel
When leaving Christmas town, hit the carosel and grab the two Jackpots
In Presents fight, use Jack's limit

boss.title: The Experiment
boss.desc: Jacks limit on the Experiment, air combos, Master Form after he does his Pinball thing

steps.desc: Get Jackpot in area before leaving Agrabah City
Pause XIII
menu: Equip Decisive Pumpkin to Master form

boss.title: Jafar
boss.desc: Use Finishing Leap into Horizontal Slash combos on Jafar, and do Jafars roll up Reaction Command

steps.desc: Use Magnet on Nobodies in Beast's Castle
Master form before loading Xaldin fight

boss.title: Xaldin
boss.desc: Abuse Learn command.

steps.desc: Finishing Leap combo, into Trinity Limit, into Limit form against Riku
Wisdom Form to run down mountain
Trinity Limit when in required fight outside Palace
Magnet a bunch in hallway fight
Limit form before going out to fight Storm Rider

boss.title: Storm Rider
boss.desc: Trinity Limit to finish him off

steps.desc: Wisdom Form to run through Twilight Town, cut through underground (take left path)
Use Magnet and then summon Stitch in required battle outside mansion
Pause XIV before Roxas

boss.title: Roxas
boss.desc: Do guard, three ground combos, ice on Roxas. Limit Form near end

steps.desc: Pause XV
menu: Equip Ethers and Elixirs and stuff to Sora
Go to Donald, equip Flare Force

steps.desc: In Elevator, drive to Master to try and get to Final
Buy as many Ethers as possible from Moogle (sell Potions)
Pause XVI

boss.title: Xigbar
boss.desc: Against Xigbar, use Donald's Flare Force (should have 1-2 bars left), then air combo

steps.desc: Pause XVII

boss.title: Luxord
boss.desc: Use Trinity Limit into Limit Form on Luxord, use an Ether, then reflect a bunch until it's time to reflect again

steps.desc: Pause XVIII

boss.title: Saix
battle: Use Reflect and Finishing Leap combos on Saix
With 1 Life Bar left, limit form on him

steps.desc: Pause XIX
Wisdom form to climb the tower

boss.title: Xemnas I
battle: Finishing Leap combos on Xemnas while waiting for Tower thing
Wait until Third reaction command for Xemnas
Magnet and Thunder right away on Xemnas as he falls
Do Finishing Leap combos on Xemnas, reflect when he attacks you, Trinity Limit when he has two life bars left, then limit form

steps.desc: Summon Stitch and Magnet during Reactor Core
Keep using Magnet
Use Reflect on Armor Dude, then summon Mickey if you haven't used him yet
Ground combos and reflect on second form of Armor Dude

boss.title: Final Xemnas
battle: Reflect and Triangle Reaction commands during reversal part of Xemnas
Limit form on Xemnas, then use Ethers and Reflects, and session/Trinity Limit
